name: Feel Like Makin’ Love
content: Yeah  when the spirit moves you
Baby  when I think about you
如果昨天我有这些金色的梦
我会把你抛向天空一直感受着
Feel like makin' love to you
Baby  if I think about you
And if I had the sun and moon
你知道我会同时给你日夜
Feel like makin' love to you
And if I had the sun and moon
你知道我会同时给你日夜
I want to give you the sun
我想给你太阳和月亮还有所有的星星
因为我感觉像是在恋爱
Feel like makin' love to you
我感觉像是在和你恋爱
Feel like makin' love to you
我感觉像是在和你恋爱
